title: Authorizes certain cities to implement a pilot truck weight photo-monitoring system at certain intersections throughout the city
summary: Authorizes certain cities to implement a pilot truck weight photo-monitoring system at certain intersections throughout the city; requires owners of trucks to be monetarily liable when an operator of their truck drives the truck on a public highway in violation of a posted "No Truck" zone; establishes certain affirmative defenses.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to truck weight photo-monitoring systems in cities with a population of one million or more
